input_text:
Job Title: Busser - Hard Rock Bars - Starting at $16.85

Location: San Diego, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Summary

Clears cleans and sets tables in a restaurant setting.

Qualifications

 Responsibilities 

Typically requires a high school diploma and 0 to 2 years of experience.Performs work under direct supervision.Handles basic issues and problems and refers more complex issues to higher-level staff.Possesses beginning to working knowledge of subject matter.Clerical skills. Organizational skills. Oral communication skills. Customer/client orientation.

Responsibilities

Clears dish or glassware from tables during service.Cleans and sets tables in between guests.Maintains cleanliness of the dining area.Stocks service areas and assists waitstaff as needed.May be expected to assist with dishwashing.

 Property Details 

 FLOAT AND 207 AT HARD ROCK HOTEL SAN DIEGO 

Voted San Diego’s Best Rooftop Bar, FLOAT is set atop Hard Rock Hotel surrounded by panoramic views of the electric Gaslamp Quarter. In the afternoon find a stylish poolside oasis, which evolves into a sophisticated lounge featuring fire pits and music each night. Private poolside cabanas can be reserved day and night. Hotel guests and locals can enjoy the weekly Liquid Sunshine pool party all summer long, as well as special events featuring some of the top D Js in the world. Whether the sun is up or down, there is something to fit every mood and satisfy every impulse at FLOAT.

Seven days a week, 207 offers hotel guests a hip yet unpretentious bar and lounge to enjoy a vast selection of wine, beer and hard-to-find, ultra-premium spirits. Midweek and during the sunny San Diego days, 207 bar it’s a great place for casual conversation over cocktails on the outdoor terrace or catching the game on one of our many flat screens. Weekend nights it’s one of San Diego’s hottest and friendliest Downtown San Diego bars.

Company Overview

As the global leader in third-party hotel management, our growing portfolio represents over 1,550 hotels in all 50 states and 22 countries, from top international lodging brands to luxury hotels, destination resorts and lifestyle hotels. Our associates around the globe are passionate about serving our guests and driving exceptional results, and thrive in a culture where everyone is inspired to be the best. Join a world of possibility with Aimbridge Hospitality.

Benefits

After an initial waiting period, those hired into full time positions are eligible for a competitive benefits package that includes the following:

 Now offering Daily Pay! Ask your Recruiter for more details  Medical, Dental, and Vision Coverage  Short-Term and Long-Term Disability Income  Term Life and AD&D Insurance  Paid Time Off  Employee Assistance Program  401k Retirement Plan 

Compensation Min

USD $15.50/Hr.

Compensation Mid

USD $18.60/Hr.

Compensation Max

USD $22.32/Hr.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Busser - Hard Rock Bars
output_json.summary: Clears cleans and sets tables in a restaurant setting.
job_responsibilities: Clears dish or glassware from tables during service.
Cleans and sets tables in between guests.
Maintains cleanliness of the dining area.
Stocks service areas and assists waitstaff as needed.
May be expected to assist with dishwashing.
